validator.arg: {"script":"(cfValues['EC Type']?.value.toString() == 'Standard EC' && cfValues['Reason for change']?.value.toString() != 'Component Obsolescence' && cfValues['Reason for change']?.value.toString() != 'Cost reduction' && cfValues['Reason for change']?.value.toString() != 'Alternative source for shortage' && cfValues['Reason for change']?.value.toString() != 'Equipment Replacement' && cfValues['Reason for change']?.value.toString() != 'Supply Chain Improvement') || (cfValues['EC Type']?.value.toString() != 'Standard EC' && (cfValues['Reason for change']?.value.toString() == 'Component Obsolescence' || cfValues['Reason for change']?.value.toString() == 'Cost reduction' || cfValues['Reason for change']?.value.toString() == 'Alternative source for shortage' || cfValues['Reason for change']?.value.toString() == 'Equipment Replacement' || cfValues['Reason for change']?.value.toString() == 'Supply Chain Improvement'))","scriptPath":null,"parameters":{}}

Error: you cannot select 'Cost reduction' reason for change if you select to create a Standard EC, otherwise, if you select a CR issue you cannot select a reason for change different from 'Cost Reduction'
